name: Underwater Mysteries
description:
This game is made by Arnav Ghatti for Infix game jam. It is a puzzle platformer. You need to get both the players to the end but the blue character cannot jump on the red platform. At first the platform is white but when blue character jumps on it, it turns blue and when red character jumps on it, it turns red. All the art was made in photoshop and the game engine used is GODOT. If there is any problem in downloading the files, please ask in the comments.

Controls - 

1) Up arrow key to jump

2) Right arrow key to move right

3) Left arrow key to move left

4) Space to switch between players 

I hope you Enjoy this game =)
